column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////        We started with appetizers. We got the Malnati salad
column2: and mozzarella sticks. The mozzarella sticks were AMAZING! The cheese was so gooey
column3: and it was breaded perfectly. The salad was out of this world! It was fresh & crisp
column5: so that we had room for the amazing deep dish.
